channel.title: git on Hugo's IT journal
channel.description: Recent content in git on Hugo's IT journal

item.title: Broken Git Ref
item.description: Facing this warning in a repo warning: ignoring broken ref refs/remotes/origin/HEAD https://stackoverflow.com/questions/45811971/warning-ignoring-broken-ref-refs-remotes-origin-head After reading this article, seem the reference of refs/remotes/origin/HEAD is broken. $ git symbolic-ref refs/remotes/origin/HEAD refs/remotes/origin/master I have changed the branch from master to main before.
